patterns: Tell me about the Teaching-Learning Unit (TLU)
Can you describe the Teaching-Learning Unit?
What is the purpose of TLU?
responses: The Teaching-Learning Unit (TLU) promotes new pedagogical skills, which help faculty and instructors deliver knowledge effectively. TLU empowers faculty to experiment with teaching methods and provides modern infrastructure, including state-of-the-art studio classrooms, to deliver content online to students.

patterns: Tell me about the services provided by TLU
responses: Through TLU activities, faculty members are empowered to experiment with teaching methods. TLU provides modern infrastructure like studio classrooms, LMS, and online scheduled lectures to deliver content online to students.

patterns: What is the contact for TLU?
Tell me the TLU contact details
responses: You can contact the TLU section at tlu.admin@iitjammu.ac.in or reach out for LMS support at tlu.support@iitjammu.ac.in. For phone inquiries, call 0191-2570282.

patterns: Where can I access the LMS?
Give me the link to LMS
responses: You can access the LMS homepage at [lms.iitjammu.ac.in](https://lms.iitjammu.ac.in).
